meanings.definition: To carry or drag something with effort or difficulty.
meanings.sent1: She shleps her heavy backpack to school every day.
meanings.sent2: He shleps the groceries from the car to the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The little dog shleps its oversized toy around the house.
meanings.sent4: The determined ant shleps the food crumb back to its nest.
meanings.sent5: The tired traveler shleps their suitcase up the stairs.

meanings.definition: A person who carries or drags something with effort or difficulty.
meanings.sent1: The shleps at the airport help with luggage.
meanings.sent2: My grandpa is a real shleps when it comes to moving furniture.
meanings.sent3: The shleps in the moving company always have aching muscles.
meanings.sent4: She's a shleps when it comes to carrying groceries up the stairs.
meanings.sent5: The shleps in the warehouse work hard to move heavy boxes.
